trans-unit.source: Defines constants for the well-known claim types that can be assigned to a subject.
trans-unit.target: クレームの既知のタイプのうち、サブジェクトに割り当て可能なもののための定数を定義します。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: このクラスは継承できません。

trans-unit.source: These constants define URIs for well-known claim types.
trans-unit.target: これらの定数は、よく知られているクレームの種類の Uri を定義します。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2009/09/identity/claims/actor.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2009/09/identity/claims/actor。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user; http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 匿名ユーザーを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authenticated.
trans-unit.target: ID が認証されたかどうかに関する詳細を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authenticated)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the instant at which an entity was authenticated; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationinstant.
trans-unit.target: エンティティが認証された瞬間を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationinstant)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the method with which an entity was authenticated; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationmethod.
trans-unit.target: エンティティが認証されたメソッドを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationmethod)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity; http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.
trans-unit.target: エンティティに対する承認決定を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the cookie path; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/cookiepath.
trans-unit.target: cookie パスを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/cookiepath)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.
trans-unit.target: エンティティが存在する国/地域を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの生年月日を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the deny-only primary group SID on an entity; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarygroupsid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの拒否専用プライマリ グループ SID を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarygroupsid)。

trans-unit.source: A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
trans-unit.target: 拒否専用 SID は、セキュリティで保護できるオブジェクトに対して指定されたエンティティを拒否します。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the deny-only primary SID on an entity; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarysid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの拒否専用プライマリ SID を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarysid)。

trans-unit.source: A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
trans-unit.target: 拒否専用 SID は、セキュリティで保護できるオブジェクトに対して指定されたエンティティを拒否します。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの拒否専用のセキュリティ識別子 (SID) を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid)。

trans-unit.source: A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
trans-unit.target: 拒否専用 SID は、セキュリティで保護できるオブジェクトに対して指定されたエンティティを拒否します。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlywindowsdevicegroup.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlywindowsdevicegroup。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.
trans-unit.target: X.509 証明書のサブジェクトまたは発行者のコンピューター名または代替名と関連付けられた DNS 名を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns)。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/dsa.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/dsa。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/email.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの電子メール アドレスを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/email)。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expiration.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expiration。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expired.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expired。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/gender.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの性別を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/gender)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの名を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the SID for the group of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/groupsid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティのグループの SID を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/groupsid)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a hash value, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/hash.
trans-unit.target: ハッシュ値を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/hash)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/homephone.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの自宅電話番号を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/homephone)。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/ispersistent.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/ispersistent。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/locality.
trans-unit.target: エンティティが存在するロケールを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/locality)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/mobilephone.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの携帯電話番号を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/mobilephone)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの名前を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの名前を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/otherphone.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの代替電話番号を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/otherphone)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/postalcode.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの郵便番号を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/postalcode)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the primary group SID of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarygroupsid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティのプライマリ グループ SID を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarygroupsid)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the primary SID of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarysid.
trans-unit.target: エンティティのプライマリ SID を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarysid)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the role of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/role.
trans-unit.target: エンティティのロールを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/role)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa.
trans-unit.target: RSA キーを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a serial number, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/serialnumber.
trans-unit.target: シリアル番号を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/serialnumber)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID), http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/sid.
trans-unit.target: セキュリティ識別子 (SID) を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/sid)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn.
trans-unit.target: サービス プリンシパル名 (SPN) クレームを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince.
trans-unit.target: エンティティが存在する都道府県を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの番地を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの姓を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.
trans-unit.target: システム エンティティを示すクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 拇印を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint)。

trans-unit.source: A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 拇印は、X.509 証明書のグローバルに一意な SHA-1 ハッシュです。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a user principal name (UPN), http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn.
trans-unit.target: ユーザー プリンシパル名 (UPN) を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies a URI, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri.
trans-unit.target: URI を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri)。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/userdata.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/userdata。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/version.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/version。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the webpage of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの Web ページを指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage)。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a claim that specifies the Windows domain account name of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsaccountname.
trans-unit.target: エンティティの Windows ドメイン アカウント名を指定するクレームの URI (http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsaccountname)。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdeviceclaim.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdeviceclaim。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdevicegroup.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdevicegroup。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsfqbnversion.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsfqbnversion。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowssubauthority.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowssubauthority。

trans-unit.source: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsuserclaim.
trans-unit.target: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsuserclaim。

trans-unit.source: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/x500distinguishedname.
trans-unit.target: X.509 証明書の識別名クレームの URI (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/x500distinguishedname)。

trans-unit.source: The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that are used by X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: X.500 標準では、X.509 証明書で使用される識別名を定義する方法が定義されています。
